page.title: 20Children's Games
page.content:
Bulldog Bulldog is a game where you find a person to be "on" who stands in the middle and shouts Bulldog. All the other people run to the other side of the playing area and the person in the middle tries to catch them. If he does he shouts 1,2,3,Bulldog. This carries on till everyone is caught.
Dickie Levo You pick sides and one side count to 100 in 5's. and chase the other side. When they catch them they shout 1,2,3, Dickie Levo and that person is out until one of his team frees him.
Kerby You throw a bouncy ball at the kerb. the other person has to catch it before it bounces.
